Title: Oh Louie / Tickets
Plot: The episode begins in a flashback with Louie filming the pilot for a sitcom. After complaining about the unrealistic dialogue and use of Bob Saget as the next door neighbor, Louie is shown arriving home to an unseen and presumably upset wife and their newborn baby Lilly. The episode then jumps to Lilly's tenth birthday. ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language, sexual material and other content that may offend
GuestStars: Dane Cook, Bob Saget, Jim Norton
